# reserve(locale:)

**Type Method**

Add an asset locale to the app’s current reservations.

## Declaration

```swift
@discardableResult static func reserve(locale: Locale) async throws -> Bool
```

## Return Value

`false` if the locale was already reserved.

## Discussion

If an asset that supports the input locale exists, adds that asset’s locale to [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/AssetInventory/reservedLocales].
title: reserve(locale:)
